local.title: Localized
local.text: I'm from Germany and life in a small town near Dortmund.

freetime.title: My freetime
freetime.text: In my freetime I build modern web applications like pwa's & spa's.

born.title: Born
born.text: I'm 20 years old and born in germany.

standart.title: HTML | CSS | JS
standart.text: I started with learning the basics of web-development since 2016. I have read posts, blogs and watched tutorials on youtube to learn every day more and more. HTML, CSS, and JS are the normal stuff I use in my daily turn.

vue.title: VUE JS
vue.text: After I learned the basics I started learning vuejs and experience a whole new way to learn javascript. This framework is a unique example of a beautiful perfection which is so fast and easy to learn. I created tons of websites with vuejs and I gained much experience.

python.title: Python
python.text: I am also interested in python to create backend stuff for the web but also for machine learning. I learned it from great youtubers but also with the use of vuejs.

modern.title: Modern Stuff
modern.text: New technologies are also in my portfolio. Machine learning, face recognition, autonomous driving. Things like ML I do often with Tensorflow for the web with tensorflow.js but also with python on raspberry pi.

card1.title: IoT
card1.text: I have read a lot of articles all around IoT. By myself, I played a lot with Arduino and raspberry pi to create funny and useful examples to learn more and more.

card2.title: Cryptocurrency
card2.text: To follow the newest trends is awesome. Everything is new and you can build it up from the ground. The technology behind the blockchain is great and to play with it makes a lot of fun.

card3.title: VUE JS
card3.text: To learn vuejs is for me a daily routine. It's not just a framework, vuejs is more like a peace in mind where I can let my workflow and can create new awesome stuff.
